scenes.description: Hololive English -Myth- performing their original song 'Myth or Treat' in 3D chibi avatars on a Halloween-themed stage.
Gawr Gura stands alone on stage, expressing deep gratitude to her fellow Myth members, the creative staff, and the fans.
Gawr Gura excitedly reveals her 2022 Birthday Merchandise, showcasing a postcard, a rubber mat, and a Dino Gura plushie.
